title: The 'Sindoori Kiran' Diamond and Coral Addigai Pendant
materials: Natural Coral Gemstone. Showcases traditional gold craftsmanship.
features: Intricate filigree design inspired by traditional Telugu floral motifs, adorned with meticulously set diamonds. A striking Coral drop pendant adds a touch of vibrancy and auspiciousness. Features a crescent moon 'Addigai' design suitable for modern and traditional styling.
occasions: and Dasara. Also suitable for semi-formal events and special occasions where you want to add a touch of South Indian elegance.
description: This exquisite Addigai pendant seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The use of high-quality 22K gold and brilliant diamonds ensures lasting beauty and value. The Coral gemstone brings prosperity and positive energy. A timeless piece to be treasured for generations.
